In Pakistan, at least 43 people have been killed...
...after motorists on bikes opened fire on a bus carrying Shiite Muslims.
In Ukraine, Prime Minister Arseny Yatsenyuk will meet with French President Francois Hollande...
In North Korea, a South Korea spy agency says Kim Jong-Un executed a defense minister...
...for falling asleep at a military event.
In China, officials warn the US...
...not to take "risky and provocative" actions in the South China Sea.
...members of the Lebanese parliament fail to elect a president for the 23rd time.
